creator: joachim.unger@softwareag.com
text:
I have following code

<fo:block font-family="Helvetica" font-size="5mm">This is a line with property 
font-size="5mm". <fo:inline font-size="1.5em">This is another 
(inline) one with property font-size="1.5em". <fo:inline font-
size="1.5em">This is another (2xinline) one with property font-
size="1.5em".</fo:inline></fo:inline>

</fo:block>

You will get different pdf-output.
I think: fop's output is not correct. See the output in the attachment above.

Regards,
Joachim Unger
Bug fixed in latest Trunk (rev 584703), and probably in FOP 0.94
